item.title: Mercedes 1526 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 22, 2025

Mercedes 1526 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 1526 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic and robust medium-duty truck, widely used in South America. It features high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. The mod includes customization options such as chassis types, accessories, and paint jobs, along with functional lights and animations. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for players who enjoy vintage Mercedes-Benz trucks with reliable performance and authentic styling.

Credits: qra sol

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 22, 2025

MB 113 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 113 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic and durable truck model popular in Brazil and other regions. It features high-quality textures, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. The mod includes multiple customization options, such as chassis configurations, accessories, and paint jobs, along with functional lighting and animations. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for fans of vintage Mercedes-Benz trucks who enjoy a reliable and nostalgic driving experience.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 22, 2025

Mercedes Benz 1938 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 1938 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic and powerful heavy-duty truck to the game. Known for its durability and iconic design, this mod features high-quality exterior and interior details, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. It includes various customization options, such as chassis configurations, accessories, and paint jobs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for fans of vintage Mercedes-Benz trucks looking for a strong and immersive driving experience.

item.title: Bipartido 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 22, 2025

Bipartido 1.53 ETS2

The Bipartido mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a realistic two-part (bi-articulated) trailer commonly used in Brazil for heavy and long-haul cargo. It features high-quality textures, accurate physics, and functional lighting, providing a realistic freight transport experience. The mod includes various customization options, such as axle types, paint jobs, and accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this trailer is ideal for players who enjoy handling large and challenging loads across long distances.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: MAPA BAHIA FULL 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 22, 2025

MAPA BAHIA FULL 1.53 ETS2

The Mapa Bahia Full mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a detailed and expansive map of the Bahia region in Brazil. Featuring realistic cities, highways, rural roads, landscapes, and regional landmarks, this map provides an immersive driving experience inspired by real-world Brazilian geography. It includes custom buildings, unique delivery points, challenging routes, and optimized performance. Fully compatible with ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who want to explore new territories and enjoy a rich Brazilian trucking adventure.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
